text: Carlos Mauro Cabral Benevides (born 21 March 1930) is a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He is a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement Party. Benevides was born in Fortaleza, Brazil. From 1959 to 1975, he was a member of the state legislature of Ceará. From 1975 until 1983 and again from 1987 until 1995, Benevides was a member of the Senate representing Ceará. From 1991 to 1993, he was the President of the Federal Senate. From 2007 to 2015, Benevides was a member of the Chamber of Deputies. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Federal Senate Category:Politicians from Ceará Category:People from Fortaleza Category:Brazilian lawyers
title: Mauro Benevides
